Description:
Unfixed method for UAC bypass from Windows 10. WSReset.exe file associated with the Windows Store. It will run a binary file contained in a low-privilege registry.

Author: oscd.community, Dmitry Uchakin
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: UAC Bypass Via Wsreset
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\appx82a6gwre4fdg3bt635tn5ctqjf8msdd2\shell\open\command'
